description: üëã I'm Qing Lu. As a professional web developer, I have always been result-oriented and solution-oriented. In addition, I am good at thinking and have strong logical thinking skills,

and I am especially passionate about using coding techniques and programming solutions. At the same time, I am still a creative and imaginative person, which is of great help to my work in UI/UX design. I am good at putting forward design plans and solutions with customers as the center. I can learn quickly and design scalable solutions to challenging problems, which will allow me to work as a front-end designer and developer. In terms of website design and development, I reckon that thinking and imagination are the prerequisites for doing things. The design and planning of the website is very important in the entire workflow. Because the correct design and planning of the website in advance can avoid losses caused by major problems in the later period. In addition, the design is to better serve users, both in terms of appearance and function. I firmly believe that good design will bring users a good mood and a more convenient lifestyle. I am full of enthusiasm for my career, and I hope to work hard to do everything well. I look forward to new things and new challenges, which can make me continue to improve and gradually become a leader.üíú

projects.title: UX Work I
projects.description: This is an APP for sharing electric bicycles. The entire research, design, and prototype work was done by myself. The main content of the APP includes reserve or scan electric bike, lock or unlock electric bike, make payment, load payment account, etc. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: UX Work II
projects.description: This is a group assignment on UX for online shopping, which was done by me and two other classmates. The main parts I am responsible for are ‚ÄúConfirm order‚Äù, ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù, ‚ÄúReview center‚Äù, ‚ÄúLeave a review‚Äù.

projects.title: UX WORK III
projects.description: This is a case study of a fitness mobile APP. The main content includes project proposal, UX implementation, design system, etc. It is a very complete mobile APP design process.

projects.title: Icon Art Work
projects.description: This is a set of icons completed using the golden section principle. It is based on the theme of Japanese anime One Piece. The main characters include Luffy, Sanji, Nami, Chopper, Usopp, Zoro. I like this work very much, both in terms of color and appearance.

projects.title: Brand Standards Manual
projects.description: This is a brand standards manual designed for SPLASH energy drinks. It was completed by me and one of my classmates. This standards manual mainly shows our logo and packaging design for this energy drink.

projects.title: P.S.A
projects.description: This is a public service announcement about health. It reminds people to pay more attention to their health and not to rely on drugs to sustain their lives by eating pills on a plate as a meal.

projects.title: Visual Rhetoric Shape Morph
projects.description: This is a video about growth done with After Effect. A lifetime is very short. I hope everyone can make their lives full of love and cherish every day.

projects.title: 2D character animation
projects.description: This is a small animation done with Adobe Character and After Effect. I really like this animated character I designed. Also got a good grade of A.

projects.title: Kinetic Typography
projects.description: This video shows the song of Believer in the form of kinetic typography, which is completed by After Effect.

workContent: Monitored the systems and respond to security, usability and performance concerns

Maintained and monitor daily performance of computer systems
Collaborated with designers and product owners to build meaningful tests
Established and maintain operating procedures documents
Helped test front end and API, report bugs to developers
Discussed project process with back end developers
Worked with QA and release teams to test and release code into production environments.
Designed event posters with Photoshop
Helped DevOps engineer to create DNS records in development environment

Created accounts, reset password and give permissions for user
Received user applications tickets through online application system, managed related accounts and permissions for users including creation, deletion, and modification
Account collaborated and ensured effective communication between all teams
Reviewed the account regularly with the audit company, cooperated with audit company to complete various tasks
Successfully implemented on-the-job training of the new operating system and inspection of new employees
Created & maintained internal support documentation for team members to reference
experience.title: Mercedes-Benz Automotive Finance Co., Ltd. - Beijing

workContent: Learned from IT professionals how to meet the support needs of all the Lenovo users around China
Responded to client calls or WeChat consulting by providing accurate information regarding products and services offered through Lenovo PC
Provided phone and online support to users
Delivered troubleshooting solutions to user experiencing difficulties with software, hardware, and network connectivity
Helped customers submit technical tickets to related departments to solve the problem
Maintained a positive and professional approach with customers and other service teams
